Riverbed's new operating system optimizes Exchange 2007 and Oracle 11i and offers branch offices virtualized services without additional hardware. Satya Nadella has deep experience in both our server business and online services, which will help accelerate our momentum while setting the course to deliver the cloud computing scenarios of the future, said Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer , in a statement. Satya Nadella replaces Microsoft veteran Bob Muglia as head of the highly profitable server business.
